original_text: They worshiped the Lord, but they also appointed all sorts of their own people to officiate for them as priests in the shrines at the high places.
korean_text: 그들이 또 여호와를 경외하여 자기 중에서 사람을 산당의 제사장으로 택하여 그 산당들에서 자기를 위하여 제사를 드리게 하니라

sentences.original_text: all sorts of their own people
to officiate for them as priests
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장으로서 그들을 위해 집례하게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: in the shrines at the high places
